title: Congress rejects President Trump's deep NASA budget cuts, proposes $24.4 billion for the agency
description: Congress plans to allocate $24.4 billion to NASA for fiscal year 2026, nearly $6 billion more than President Trump had proposed.
content: Congress plans to allocate $24.4 billion to NASA for fiscal year 2026, nearly $6 billion more than President Trump had proposed.
